name: AIPD - Artificial Intelligence Police Department
description: Enter the AI universe and fight evil AIs with a variety of weapons and modifications. AIPD is a top-down coop twin-stick shooter where you can enjoy thousands of possible combinations of enemy and arena permutations that give you an unprecedented and nearly unlimited arcade experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 32-Bit Processor: Intel i5 1.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I also covered this game on my YouTube channel:         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  AIPD - Artificial Intelligence Police Department (PC, Xbox One, PS4) - Retro Flashforward

One of the best twin stick shooters I've played in a long time!  It has a really cool art style, energizing music and fast-paced gameplay action. There are actually a lot of things to discover: What does each power-up do? What weapons and ship mods work well together? How do you adapt to the various challenges you have to choose between the waves?  I also bought it on PS4 where it also runs amazingly smooth.
A Twin-Stick Shooter Arena, Similar to Geometry Wars
